directions: Put beef stew meat, potatoes, onion, and carrot in the crock of a slow cooker. Add tomato sauce, water, red wine, beef bouillon cubes, onion soup mix, rosemary, garlic powder, salt, and pepper to the beef mixture; stir gently.
Whisk cornstarch into water until dissolved; stir gently into the beef mixture.
ingredients: 2 pounds beef stew meat, trimmed and cut into 1-inch cubes
1 (15 ounce) can new potatoes, drained and quartered
1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix (such as Lipton®)
title: Hearty Slow Cooked Beef Stew
